table.name: Ten-Towns Encounters
table.caption: Ten-Towns Encounters
rows: The characters stumble on bile lichen.
A follower of Seer Echomorne insists the characters come and hear their dooms.
Three {@creature Imp|XMM|Imps} from Caer-Dineval ambush the characters.
Two Zhentarim {@creature Tough|XMM|Toughs} try to intimidate the characters into giving up their gold and gear.
A bloodcursed {@creature Berserker|XMM} from {@book Dougan's Hole|FRAiF|3|Dougan's Hole} fights the characters.
The characters discover a ritually murdered corpse, sacrificed to Auril.
A {@creature Priest|XMM} of Tempus, drunk on honey mead, mistakes the characters for old enemies.
A character discovers a piece of chardalyn, through which Zlan whispers to them alone.
Twelve {@creature Frost Giant|XMM|Frost Giants} on {@creature Mammoth|XMM|Mammoths} approach the gates, demanding the party be sent out.
Mind flayers speak through the voices of every person in town, announcing that the Great Thawing is nearly complete.
